pages.title: Exotic Substrate
pages.text: Take your $(item)Concentrated Substrate$() and infuse it with materials from dimensions that really shouldn't exist. An $(item)Ender Eye$() for spatial distortion, $(item)Chorus Fruit$() for dimensional resonance, and $(item)Blaze Powder$() to bind it all together.$(br2)The result is a material that doesn't quite exist in any single dimension. Uncomfortable to hold, to say the least.
